enWisdom: Every near one is close by

Wisdom: مَا أَقْرَبَ الْحَيَّ مِنَ الْمَيِّتِ لِلَحَاقِهِ بِهِ
enWisdom: How near is the living one to the dead because he will soon join him!

Wisdom: مَا أَبْعَدَ الْمَيِّتَ مِنَ الْحَيِّ لِانْقِطَاعِهِ عَنْهُ
enWisdom: How far is the dead one from the living by his separation from him!

Wisdom: مَا أَنْزَلَ الْمَوْتَ مَنْزِلَهُ مَنْ عَدَّ غَداً مِنْ أَجَلِهِ
enWisdom: He who counts tomorrow [to be] from his lifetime has not given death its rightful place

Wisdom: مَا عَسَى [من عسى‏] أَنْ يَكُونَ بَقَاءُ مَنْ لَهُ يَوْمٌ لَا يَعْدُوهُ وَطَالِبٌ حَثِيثٌ مِنْ أَجَلِهِ يَحْدُوهُ
enWisdom: How is it possible for one to live forever, when there will come a day which he will not pass and a seeker who will quickly bring him to his death, urging him forwards?
Each breath of a person is a step closer to his death
